description:
everything what you need right in the building, coffee shop , best restaurants with sushi Chinese , pizza and others . Just 3 min away from Subway

This is a very nice and private apartment. 1,200 sq ft ( 112 sq m) - spacious rooms, plus extra large living room, open kitchen, dishwasher, washer and dryer in the apartment. 
Great location, close to everything- stores, shops, restaurants. Close to the subway for an easy ride to Manhattan.
